statements: SELECT * FROM HospitalUtilization;
SELECT patient_id, admission_date, discharge_date, total_cost FROM HospitalUtilization;
SELECT total_cost, admission_date, patient_id, discharge_date FROM HospitalUtilization;
SELECT * FROM HospitalUtilization WHERE total_cost > 5000;
SELECT patient_id, admission_date, total_cost FROM HospitalUtilization WHERE admission_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM HospitalUtilization WHERE total_cost > 5000 ORDER BY admission_date DESC
SELECT patient_id, total_cost FROM HospitalUtilization WHERE discharge_date >= '2022-01-01' AND total_cost BETWEEN 2000 AND 5000
SELECT AVG(total_cost) AS avg_cost FROM HospitalUtilization GROUP BY patient_id HAVING AVG(total_cost) > 3000
SELECT DISTINCT admission_date FROM HospitalUtilization WHERE total_cost < 1000 ORDER BY admission_date
SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_admissions, SUM(total_cost) AS total_expenses FROM HospitalUtilization
SELECT * FROM HospitalUtilizationRates;
SELECT hospital_id, utilization_rate FROM HospitalUtilizationRates WHERE utilization_rate > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM HealthInsuranceContracts WHERE coverage_amount > 500;
SELECT contract_id, insurance_provider FROM HealthInsuranceContracts ORDER BY insurance_provider DESC;
SELECT hospital_id, cost_per_patient FROM HospitalUtilizationRates WHERE cost_per_patient < 1000;
SELECT * FROM HospitalUtilizationRates WHERE utilization_rate > 0.8;
SELECT hospital_id, utilization_rate FROM HospitalUtilizationRates ORDER BY utilization_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM HospitalUtilizationRates WHERE cost_per_patient BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000;
SELECT * FROM HealthInsuranceContracts WHERE coverage_amount > 5000 ORDER BY insurance_provider ASC;
SELECT hospital_id, cost_per_patient FROM HospitalUtilizationRates WHERE utilization_rate < 0.5;
SELECT * FROM HospitalUtilizationRates;
SELECT patient_id, admission_type, discharge_date FROM HospitalUtilizationRates WHERE admission_type='Emergency';
SELECT * FROM HealthInsuranceCoverage WHERE coverage_cost > 500;
SELECT insurance_provider, coverage_type FROM HealthInsuranceCoverage ORDER BY insurance_provider DESC;
SELECT contract_id, hospital_id, contract_type, contract_end_date FROM NetworkContracts WHERE contract_end_date < CURDATE();
SELECT * FROM HospitalUtilizationRates
SELECT patient_id, visit_date, admission_type FROM HospitalUtilizationRates ORDER BY visit_date DESC
SELECT insurance_provider, coverage_type FROM HealthInsuranceCoverage WHERE coverage_cost > 1000
SELECT hospital_id, contract_type, contract_start_date, contract_end_date FROM NetworkContracts WHERE hospital_id = 12345 AND contract_end_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM HealthInsuranceCoverage JOIN NetworkContracts ON HealthInsuranceCoverage.network_contract = NetworkContracts.contract_type
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT visit_id, patient_id, visit_date FROM visits WHERE diagnosis = 'Cold';
SELECT doctor_name, specialization FROM doctors ORDER BY doctor_name ASC;
SELECT hospital_name, location FROM hospitals WHERE capacity > 100;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC, patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-12-31';
SELECT * FROM visits v JOIN doctors d ON v.doctor_id = d.doctor_id WHERE d.specialization = 'Cardiology' ORDER BY v.visit_date DESC;

SELECT v.visit_id, v.visit_date, p.patient_name, d.doctor_name FROM visits v JOIN patients p ON v.patient_id = p.patient_id JOIN doctors d ON v.doctor_id = d.doctor_id WHERE p.gender = 'Male' AND d.specialization = 'Orthopedics';
SELECT h.hospital_name, COUNT(v.visit_id) AS visits_count FROM visits v JOIN hospitals h ON v.hospital_id = h.hospital_id GROUP BY h.hospital_name ORDER BY visits_count DESC;
SELECT hospital_name, city, state FROM hospitals;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT hospital_name, address FROM hospitals WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT patient_name, insurance_provider FROM patients ORDER BY insurance_provider DESC;
SELECT service_name, cost_per_unit, unit_of_measure FROM services WHERE cost_per_unit > 100.00;
SELECT * FROM hospitals ORDER BY hospital_name DESC, address ASC LIMIT 5

SELECT patients.patient_name, admissions.admission_date, admissions.total_cost FROM patients JOIN admissions ON patients.patient_id = admissions.patient_id WHERE admissions.total_cost > 5000 ORDER BY admissions.total_cost DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT patients.patient_name, hospitals.hospital_name, contracts.negotiated_rates FROM patients JOIN admissions ON patients.patient_id = admissions.patient_id JOIN contracts ON patients.insurance_provider = contracts.insurance_provider JOIN hospitals ON contracts.hospital_id = hospitals.hospital_id WHERE contracts.negotiated_rates < 2000 ORDER BY contracts.negotiated_rates ASC LIMIT 5

SELECT hospitals.hospital_name, AVG(admissions.total_cost) AS avg_cost FROM hospitals JOIN admissions ON hospitals.hospital_id = admissions.hospital_id GROUP BY hospitals.hospital_name ORDER BY avg_cost DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT services.service_name, services.cost_per_unit, hospitals.hospital_name, contracts.negotiated_rates FROM services JOIN contracts ON services.unit_of_measure = contracts.insurance_provider JOIN hospitals ON contracts.hospital_id = hospitals.hospital_id WHERE services.cost_per_unit > 100 ORDER BY services.cost_per_unit DESC LIMIT 5
